name: Vegas Penny Slots Collection
description:
Vegas Penny Slots collection - 5 of the best slots ever made.

Games included are Dolphins Dice Slots, Golden Vault, Mega Hearts 2, Kalahari Sun, and the all new Pyramid Pays 2 HD!

*Pyramid Pays 2 HD: The most awesome slot game released in 2011! All new features and gameplay!

*Kalahari Sun: Return to Africa for an all new adventure in slot machine fun!

*Dolphins Dice: With three different free games features and the crabby Crab-Pot Jackpot, there's nothing fishy about this game...

*Golden Vault: Beat the bank in The Golden Vault!

*Mega Hearts 2: With tasty fun graphics and an ultrafun multi level feature - it's Mega Hearts 2 slot machine fun! Can you win the Chocpot - a chocolatey jackpot treat?

These games are for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in these simulations are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
